summary: Numerous federal agencies have roles in promoting healthy eating. Agencies work to reduce diet-related chronic health conditions, administer food safety laws, and help people get food. Ineffective coordination among these federal agencies can lead to overlapping and duplicative efforts and other problems. We've summarized some of our work on federal diet, food safety, and food security efforts. This work points to a need for government-wide...
title: Healthy Eating: Government-wide Solutions for Promoting Healthy Diets, Food Safety, and Food Security
